Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 16
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.Poster Nr. 16 shows law-abiding, hard-working people (chemical engineer, artist, teacher, cadre), who escape being blown up by a sympathiser of Hu Feng who is apprehended before he has been able to light the fuse of a bomb.
